titles.title: A bill to amend title 3, United States Code, to provide that employees holding positions excepted from the competitive service because of their confidential or policy-determining character may not be detailed to the White House Office or certain other offices.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, OPM.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 8/2/1988--Introduced. Prohibits a Federal employee whose position has been excepted from the competitive service by reason of its confidential or policy-determining character from being detailed to the White House, the Office of the Vice President, the Domestic Policy Staff, and the Office of Administration.
